feed.title: InvenTree Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Database Changes

  • [0.17.x] SalesOrder migration unit test (#8814) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8961

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Add Serbian to LanguageContext.tsx (#8880) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8881
  • [0.17.x] Upload timeout (#8895) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8899
  • [0.17.x] fix(plugin): Ensure plugins are only installed if not deactivated (#8893) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8901
  • [0.17.x] Allow CORS for /plugin/ URLs (#8898) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8900
  • [0.17.x] Import fix (#8924) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8926
  • [0.17.x] Plugin reload fix (#8922) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8936

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8859
  • [0.17.x] Include location detail in build output table (#8923) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8927
  • [0.17.x] Add check for minimum invoke version (#8952) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8954

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.2...0.17.3

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Devops / Setup Changes

  • Update docker build workflow by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8971

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8964

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.3...0.17.4

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Fix for chart rendering (#8981) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8982
  • [0.17.x] Select first and only pending shipment for sales order barcode allocation (#8984) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8986
  • [0.17.x] Debounce checkLoginState to prevent unexpected redirection during testing (#9012) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9016
  • [0.17.x] Report bugfix (#9013) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9014

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.4...0.17.5

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Enhance creation of default settings (#9028) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9029
  • [0.17.x] feat(backend): Improve error with missing manifest (#8957) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9036
  • [0.17.x] Fix for data import (#9060) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9065

Devops / Setup Changes

  • Adjust playwright testing by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9043
  • [Backport] Update supported postgres-cli version to 15 by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9042

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9019

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.5...0.17.6

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes
